attributes.action: Start a fundraising campaign for a statue to be put up at York Citys new ground
attributes.additional_details: I can't see the council going off there own backs to bring this to reality, so it's up to us supporters to all pitch together and show everyone how much this would mean for us and the club.
attributes.background: Keith Walwyn was and always will be, loved by York City fans. He played for the club during the 80's and is second in the all time top scorers list. I can't think of a better way to honour him and his memory by having a statue made. Let's get this ball rolling and hopefully we can make this reality!
